short_summary: Request for Standing Offer for Civil Engineering Services in Quebec
description: This request for standing offer aims to invite consulting firms with Civil Engineering expertise to submit proposals for Standing Offers, providing a range of services identified in the Required Services section of this document for projects in the province of Quebec.
full_summary:
================================
### Tender Notice

#### Standing Offer for Civil Engineering Services

**Reference Number:** WS4257826599-Doc4257876612

**Publication Date:** October 13, 2023

**Closing Date:** December 19, 2023, at 14:00:00

**Title:** Standing Offer for Civil Engineering Services for Reconstruction, Remediation, and New Construction Work in Quebec

**Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding

**Solicitation Number:** WS4257826599

**Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)** is issuing a request for standing offer to consult with firms having expertise in Civil Engineering. Firms are invited to submit proposals to be considered for a standing offer contract that includes a range of civil engineering services. The services required are:

* Reconstruction and new construction work
* Remediation of existing infrastructure

The projects will be located in the province of Quebec, Canada.

**Key Requirements**

* hanya consultant with expertise in Civil Engineering
* Competency in English and French (bilingual)
* Ability to provide services in accordance withlicable trade agreements

**Trade Agreements**

This solicitation is covered by the following international trade agreements:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Regions of Delivery**

* Province of Quebec, Canada

**Contact Information**

For more information, please contact the requesting ministry at:

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
Gatineau, Quebec, Canada
Phone: [None]
Fax: [None]
Email: [maude.roy-lippe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:maude.roy-lippe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Legal Disclaimer

This document is prepared for information purposes only and does not form part of the solicitation.

By: your name
On: today’s date
